attributes.action: manage the Faslane 365 protestors and keep local roads clear
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The local people in the surrounding area of Faslane Naval Base would like the government to have more authority over the Faslane 365 protestors eg. stop the protestors from blocking the main transport routes as this affects local children getting to and from school.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
